name: Ball Fighter
description:
Ball Fighter is a puzzle game where
you take aim and blast groups of
dropping spheres to create matches
and clear the board. You can make
chains to receive additional points or
to make a game more difficult for an
opponent. When you destroy spheres
in multi-player mode, they will be
added to the opponentâ€™s board
making his task more difficult. On a
board you can find special bonuses
like a Brush, a Rocket Launcher or a
Bomb which can be used to destroy
spheres or to paint a line of them with
the same colour. You can also try a
variety of Single-player modes
(Arcade, Survival, Brain Breaker,
Player vs CPU) as well as the unique
Multi-player mode played on one
Nintendo DSi console!
